  • Method Details

    • getCode

      public static int getCode(CommandType cmd)
      Retrieves the code associated with the given CommandType.
      Parameters:
      cmd - the CommandType for which to retrieve the corresponding code
      Returns:
      the integer code mapped to the specified CommandType

    • fromCode

      public static CommandType fromCode(int code)
      Retrieves the corresponding CommandType for the given code.
      Parameters:
      code - the code to be mapped to a CommandType
      Returns:
      the CommandType associated with the specified code, or null if no matching CommandType exists

    • isAllowed

      public static boolean isAllowed(int methodNumber, ArrayList<CommandType> allowedMethodNumbers)
      Checks if the specified method number corresponds to a command that is allowed based on the provided list of allowed commands.
      Parameters:
      methodNumber - the numeric code representing a command
      allowedMethodNumbers - the list of allowed command types
      Returns:
      true if the command represented by the method number is allowed; false otherwise

    • mapToCodeList

      public static ArrayList<Integer> mapToCodeList(ArrayList<CommandType> commands)
      Maps a list of CommandType objects to a list of their corresponding integer codes.
      Parameters:
      commands - the list of CommandType objects to be converted to integer codes
      Returns:
      a list of integer codes corresponding to the provided CommandType objects
